channel.title: Read Rust - Operating Systems
channel.description: Operating Systems posts on Read Rust

item.title: Writing an OS in pure Rust
item.description: Over the past six months we've been working on a second edition of this blog. Our goals for this new version are numerous and we are still not done yet, but today we reached a major milestone: It is now possible to build the OS natively on Windows, macOS, and Linux without any non-Rust dependendencies.
item.dc:creator: Philipp Oppermann

item.title: Writing eBPF tracing tools in Rust
item.description: Writing eBPF tracing tools in Rust
item.dc:creator: Julia Evans

item.title: PoC: compiling to eBPF from Rust
item.description: I have been playing with eBPF (extended Berkeley Packet Filters), a neat feature present in recent Linux versions (it evolved from the much older BPF filters). It is a virtual machine running in thâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Geoffroy Couprie
